title: Dude i can not win a game hey i have legit inters

embed.description: OCEshots / Gold 4 75LP / 57W 60L Win Ratio 49% / Kai'Sa - 20W 20L Win Ratio 50%, Jinx - 11W 9L Win Ratio 55%, Xayah - 4W 5L Win Ratio 44%, Kled - 5W 3L Win Ratio 63%, Ashe - 3W 2L Win Ratio 60%

body:
Honestly i have no idea what's happening hey

first kai sa game:
- fizz would flash to steal the kills 
- alistar wouldn't stop engaging without me there

second game:
-jhin mid into Katrina (not saying this isn't a thing i mean I've done it and won but just read on) this jhin fed first blood... then again... then again.... and again... then when i asked "hey man just give the tower roam down bot so you don't miss out on much" he told me he's fine staying mid and hes just being out played
- top nasus SOMEHOW decided pushing his lane was a better decision against a bard top and jax jg so he just kept inting as well.

3rd game: 
i absolutely ran a muck, did not lane much just ran around ganking every lane after my jgler had gone through. played very well had great team work by everyone... 
then at the end screen my poppy tells me im stupid and i shouldnt play this game, i am confused as i dont talk much in this game, then when i reply with "orite then fuckwit" he then asks everyone to report me for that.... (what ever- next game)

4th game:
"Kai As's wet dream team" - this game with every hero on my team shouldve been a team game stomp as everyone of my teammmates in one way or another apply a stack to my passive in a team fight.
- naut gets dove countless amounts of times the poor guy. 
- gragas from the moment he was able to just wouldnt stop asking for an ff (even when we were winning at one point) 
- jgler for some reason from the get go kept spamming "we wont win this"
- sona... well low elo support poor guy didnt know where or how to stand in a team fight

5th game:
i was heavily suppressed by the pressure lee had on me but did not die until yi roamed and i was dove under tier 2 tower while my first tower was over half health.
- udyr jg was bvery clearly trolling, pinging that he was coming. would stand in lane wait for you to engage, walk up then walk off and if you died from the engage he would start fighting and int.
- fiora.... man this player... inted. plain and simple
-bot lane actually won but lee and yi's power and skill out matches up all especially considering they were hand fed.

Game 6:
i get the Lee from last game (i am so excited I'm actually going to win one) 
lee- REFUSED to gank at all, even refused to gank his duo (jax - the ryze from last game) i would let akali push i blew both her sums lee would no joke sit in the bush and i would engage then he would no joke watch. 
jax - somehow hand fed the ornn and came out of lane 0/3 (but of course i get the only jax in OCE to take grasp on jax) 
bot lane were good players not sure how they went so poorly in lane but they did flame lee for not ganking at all 

game 7: ranked is down had to play norms 

every lane wins and i get a quadra kill...... the fuck

replies.body:
Yeah I've had the same the past few days.

I play support my top and mid combined got 25 deaths pre 20 minutes so that game is done.
I play top next game, my bot and mid lose towers in sub 8 minutes. Meanwhile I'm top absorbing ganks from JG/Mid and I eventually take my own tower. Doesnt mean anything because the enemy top laner has passive gold from the rest of his team.

I know I can win my games and I honestly don't care if you die a couple of times in lane but jesus stop hard feeding the enemy team, you are making it impossible for me to try and carry you sad sacks.
and you can't say anything to them because you'll just get banned... this game is so hard now
I just need to stop playing champions that require some semblance of a functioning team. Back on the solo carry champions train.
Dude, you're Gold IV. Just pick carry champion and 1v5.

give me 1 champ i could possibly do that with with all the conditions i just gave you for 6 games in ranked. 

you may be play 1 but im going to promise you that you cant win games the same way you used to

In other words the only thing you can do about it is accept the loss of mmr and hope that your report will be enough to give them a chat ban or something and hope that you don't have them on your team in the next game and then the next game after that.
so keep accepting 6 losses and potentially more when i finish work?

Oh you thought ranked was about YOUR ability?

Starcraft 2 is the only professionally played esports that purely relies on your own ability to play, that is why the top players who play it are absolute fucking terrors to play against, who can control 3 armies attacking and harassing from 3 different areas while they macro behind it.

I know the feeling - Best thing to do is take a break from the queue. I had a 80% win rate on Sona, went from S5 to S3 in about 2 days. All green games, apart from the odd exception. Suddenly, bad run, constant inting/toxic/AFK'er games. Dropped back to S5 in the same time. Took a break for a few days, and got back to S3 with Sona.

I maintain best thing to do, is take a break. The slump will disappear eventually, have faith!
